narrative:
This was a prelicense inspection for a Class C Exhibitor license.
An application fee of $75 will need to be submitted to the Regional Office:
USDA - APHIS - Animal Care
920 Main Campus Dr
Raleigh, NC 27606
No non-compliant items identified during this inspection.
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with the applicant.

species.common: DOMESTIC PIG / POTBELLY PIG / MICRO PIG
